title: Is the new champ select coming to us this coming patch?

replies.body: If it does, it will go to NA first for testing. We'll get it the patch after that.
EUW is the server they said they would send it out on first

I'd be interested to see where you read that. Probably just reddit EUW fan boys speculation. 

_"New champion select will debut in ranked play for testing during preseason in NA and TR."_

That's sourced from [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/ranked-improvements.html). It's off the official  website, just scroll down to the "New Champion Select in Ranked" section to find the quote.
And they're not the official source, are they?
95% stuff on there happens to the actual game.
But they're not the official source, are they???
I thought Riot stated it would be going live early next year?
Oh real? I just saw it on the PBE for this coming patch thats all
I seem to remember someone saying it will be released on live early next year. Maybe I'm thinking of one of the other new features coming soon?

The announcement that went up on the site today states that "it will be introduced during the 2016 season" (they worded it differently obviously), so I can only assume it will be happening early next year.

Link: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/editorial/new-champion-select-roundtable
